DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate effect personalize nutrition intervention dietary pattern apparently healthy adult one child age 4 12 year .
DOC.brief_title: Changing Dietary Patterns : Individually Tailored Nutrition Intervention ( OKE-study )
DOC.detailed_description: Giving personalize nutrition advice perceive effective change dietary pattern give general information healthy eating .
DOC.criteria: At least aged 18 year Having one child age 4 12 year Written inform concent obtain Not meet inclusion criterion Unable unwilling comply study procedure Enrolled another study study period Not able communicate ( read , speak write ) Dutch language Having partner enrol study Being pregnant lactating study period plan become pregnant study period Having BMI low 18.5 high 35 kg/m2 Using medication low cholesterol control doctor high cholesterol level Using medication low blood pressure control doctor high blood pressure . Having diabetes type I type II Following diet ( medical selfinitiated ) plan follow diet study period Undergoing medical treatment interfere intervention . Having gain lose 5 kg body weight last 6 month .
